PATIENT_ID: TEST_AWS_001
ARRIVAL_TIME: 2026-01-15 08:00:00

[PHYSICIAN_NOTE] 2026-01-16 02:00:00
Patient developed alcohol withdrawal symptoms during hospitalization.
Tremor, sweating, and agitation noted.
ETOH withdrawal diagnosed.
Onset within 24 hours of cessation of alcohol intake.

[NURSING_NOTE] 2026-01-16 01:30:00
Patient agitated with tremor and tachycardia and sweating.
CIWA score 22.
Last drink reportedly 36 hours ago.
Cessation of alcohol confirmed by family.
